title: Creates Ktor project in a new workspace

prjName.description: Name of the project to generate.
prjName.x-prompt: What is the name of your project?

x-prompt.message: Which build system would you like to use?

engine.description: Engine to use to serve the application.

x-prompt.message: Which engine(application server) would you like to use?

groupId.x-prompt: What groupId would you like to use?

artifactId.x-prompt: What artifactId would you like to use?

x-prompt.message: Where would you like to put the configuration in?

skipCodeSamples.x-prompt: Would you like to include code samples?

features.description: Features to use in the project(comma-separated). Follow this guide https://t.ly/s9bo for more instructions on how to proceed.

transformIntoMultiModule.description: Transform the project into a multi-module project. Follow this guide https://t.ly/dZelN for more information.

addToExistingParentModule.description: Add the project into an existing parent module project. Follow this guide https://t.ly/dZelN for more information.

parentModuleName.description: Name of the parent module to create or to add child project into.

keepProjectLevelWrapper.description: Keep the `Maven` or `Gradle` wrapper files from child project (when generating a multi-module project). Follow this guide https://t.ly/dZelN for more information.

ktorInitializrUrl.description: The URL to the Ktor Initializr instance to use to generate the project.

proxyUrl.description: The URL of the (corporate) proxy server to use to access Ktor Initializr.

tags.description: Add tags to the project (used for linting).

directory.description: A directory where the project is placed.
